review_data.title: A tourist in my own city

review_data.title: Wow!

review_data.title: Poor food & service

review_data.title: Ethiopian experience
review_data.content: The real taste of Ethiopia! Great food! Love this place. Not fancy The walls are painted with ethiopian village.

review_data.title: The discovery of the Ethiopian kitchen
review_data.content: This was my first experience of Ethiopian kitchen. I found it very interesting and tasteful. The ambiance is really special, you have the sensation to be in a great family. I suggest to go there and try, good value for good food. Thank you

review_data.title: Habesha restaurant was great!!
review_data.content: This is my favorite Ethiopian restaurant!! When I see that it's avavilable on Groupon, I always go!!!

review_data.title: Gute äthiopische Küche und freundliche Bedienung

review_data.title: Authentic and great value
review_data.content: Delicious food at very reasonable prices. The staff were eager to please and were genuinely happy to see us enjoying the food. I've never been to Ethiopia or Eritrea but Habesha struck me as very authentic: food eaten with hands, coffee roasted fresh and served...More

review_data.title: Excellent

review_data.title: Authentic Injera
review_data.content: This is a meeting place for the local Eritrean and Ethiopian community. It is simple but servers good and authentic Ethiopian food. I like the Injera pattern and great to eat with your hands!

review_data.title: Es war ein spezieller Besuch

review_data.title: good food

review_data.title: The best
review_data.content: Friendly owner, authentic atmosphere, good food, and good coffee! It's one of my favourite places in Zurich, for lunch or in the evening.
